ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But as for anyone who turns away and is kafir,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Other than him who turns his back and denies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But whoever will turn away (from the Truth),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, those who turn away and disbelieve,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except whoever turns away and disbelieves –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Save the one who turns away and disbelieves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But whoever turns back and disbelieves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But he who turns his back, and disbelieves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But whoso is averse and disbelieveth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But whoever turns back and denies the truth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But whosoever will turn back and disbelieve -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except him who turns back and disbelieves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But if any turn away and reject Allah,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Save the one who turns away and disbelieves
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As for those who turn their back and disbelieve,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But whoever turns away and disbelieves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [88:23] But he who turns away, [he who] rejects faith, and disbelieves, in the Qur’ān,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Later on, Allah commanded him to fight them, saying: (But whoso is averse and disbelieveth) except he who turns away from faith and disbelieves in Allah,
